name: MagicLanternGoPro
tagline: Magic Lantern for GoPro HERO3 Black / HERO3+ Black / HERO3+ Silver cameras
body:
MagicLanternGoPro
=================

Magic Lantern for GoPro HERO3 Black / HERO3+ Black / HERO3+ Silver cameras.
Hacks for Image Control, such as AE, Lock Exposure, Video and Photo Effects, Protune for photos...
Please test it and report bugs to [my mail](mailto:mail@chernowii.com)
Need a custom hack? [mail me!](mailto:mail@chernowii.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
